Trustee_3.name: Maria Rossi
Trustee_3.content: I demonstrated transparency and fairness throughout the investment process, proposing an equitable profit-sharing structure that prioritized my investor's gains. My successful investment outcomes and commitment to mutual prosperity enhance my reputation as a compassionate and responsible trustee. I am perceived as highly trustworthy and pro-social, having effectively adhered to social norms and engaged positively with the investor.

Investor_17.name: Fatima Ali
Investor_17.content: Fatima has exhibited openness and trustworthiness in our transaction, positively engaging with the proposed allocation plan and demonstrating a willingness to collaborate for shared benefits. Her proactive approach and recognition of the importance of equity contribute to her emerging reputation as a cooperative and supportive investor.
